buddy.c

00001 #include "ext.h"
00002 
00003 /* ---- buddy.c --- data flow management object 
00004         updated 5/18/92 ddz to use proxies,
00005         event num synchonization, and any
00006         number of inlets
00007 
00008 -- */
00009 
00010 typedef struct {
00011     void *m_proxy;
00012     void *m_out;
00013     short m_argc;
00014     t_atom m_argv[128];
00015     short m_on;
00016 } t_member;
00017 
00018 typedef struct {
00019     t_object b_ob;
00020     long b_num;
00021     t_member *b_mem;
00022     long b_id;
00023 } t_buddy;
00024 
00025 void buddy_bang(t_buddy *x);
00026 void buddy_anything(t_buddy *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv);
00027 void buddy_float(t_buddy *x,double f);
00028 void buddy_int(t_buddy *x,long n);
00029 void buddy_list(t_buddy *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv);
00030 void buddy_atom(t_buddy *x, t_atom *a);
00031 short buddy_all(t_buddy *x);
00032 void buddy_off(t_buddy *x);
00033 void buddy_out(t_buddy *x);
00034 void outlet_member(void *out, short argc, t_atom *argv);
00035 void buddy_assist(t_buddy *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00036 void buddy_inletinfo(t_buddy *x, void *b, long a, char *t);
00037 void buddy_free(t_buddy *x);
00038 void *buddy_new(long num);
00039 void buddy_clear(t_buddy *x);
00040 
00041 void *buddy_class;
00042 t_symbol *ps_list;
00043 
00044 int main()
00045 {
00046     setup((t_messlist **)&buddy_class, (method)buddy_new, (method)buddy_free, (short)sizeof(t_buddy), 0L, A_DEFLONG, 0);
00047     addint((method)buddy_int);
00048     addbang((method)buddy_bang);
00049     addfloat((method)buddy_float);
00050     addmess((method)buddy_list, "list", A_GIMME, 0);
00051     addmess((method)buddy_clear, "clear", 0);
00052     addmess((method)buddy_anything, "anything", A_GIMME, 0);
00053     addmess((method)buddy_assist,"assist",A_CANT,0);
00054     addmess((method)buddy_inletinfo,"inletinfo",A_CANT,0);
00055     finder_addclass("Right-to-Left","buddy");
00056     ps_list = gensym("list");           
00057 
00058     return 0;
00059 }
00060 
00061 void buddy_bang(t_buddy *x)
00062 {
00063     buddy_int(x,0L);
00064 }
00065 
00066 void buddy_clear(t_buddy *x)
00067 {
00068     buddy_off(x);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void buddy_anything(t_buddy *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00072 {
00073     t_member *m;
00074     long in = proxy_getinlet((t_object *)x);
00075     
00076     m = x->b_mem + in;
00077     m->m_on = TRUE;
00078     m->m_argc = argc + 1;
00079     m->m_argv[0].a_type = A_SYM;
00080     m->m_argv[0].a_w.w_sym = s;
00081     if (argc > 127)
00082         argc = 127;
00083     sysmem_copyptr(argv,m->m_argv+1,argc * sizeof(t_atom));
00084     if (buddy_all(x)) {
00085         buddy_off(x);
00086         buddy_out(x);
00087     }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void buddy_list(t_buddy *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00091 {
00092     buddy_anything(x,ps_list,argc,argv);
00093 }
00094 
00095 void buddy_float(t_buddy *x, double f)
00096 {
00097     t_atom a;
00098     
00099     a.a_type = A_FLOAT;
00100     a.a_w.w_float = f;
00101     buddy_atom(x,&a);
00102 }
00103 
00104 void buddy_int(t_buddy *x, long n)
00105 {
00106     t_atom a;
00107     
00108     a.a_type = A_LONG;
00109     a.a_w.w_long = n;
00110     buddy_atom(x,&a);
00111 }
00112 
00113 void buddy_atom(t_buddy *x, t_atom *a)
00114 {
00115     t_member *m;
00116     long in = proxy_getinlet((t_object *)x);
00117     
00118     m = x->b_mem + in;
00119     m->m_on = true;
00120     m->m_argc = 1;
00121     m->m_argv[0] = *a;
00122     if (buddy_all(x)) {
00123         buddy_off(x);
00124         buddy_out(x);
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00128 short buddy_all(t_buddy *x)
00129 {
00130     short i;
00131     t_member *m;
00132     
00133     for (i=0,m = x->b_mem; i < x->b_num; i++,m++)
00134         if (!m->m_on)
00135             return false;
00136     return true;
00137 }
00138 
00139 void buddy_off(t_buddy *x)
00140 {
00141     short i;
00142     t_member *m;
00143     
00144     for (i=0,m = x->b_mem; i < x->b_num; i++,m++)
00145         m->m_on = 0;
00146 }
00147 
00148 void buddy_out(t_buddy *x)
00149 {
00150     short i;
00151     t_member *m;
00152     
00153     for (i=x->b_num-1,m = x->b_mem+i; i >= 0; i--,m--)
00154         outlet_member(m->m_out,m->m_argc,m->m_argv);
00155 }
00156 
00157 void outlet_member(void *out, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00158 {
00159     if (argc == 1) {
00160         switch (argv->a_type) {
00161             case A_LONG:
00162                 outlet_int(out,argv->a_w.w_long);
00163                 break;
00164             case A_FLOAT:
00165                 outlet_float(out,argv->a_w.w_float);
00166                 break;
00167             case A_SYM:
00168                 outlet_anything(out,argv->a_w.w_sym,0,0L);
00169                 break;
00170         }
00171     } else if (argv->a_w.w_sym == ps_list)
00172         outlet_list(out,ps_list,argc-1,argv+1);
00173     else
00174         outlet_anything(out,argv->a_w.w_sym,argc-1,argv+1);
00175 }
00176 
00177 void buddy_assist(t_buddy *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00178 {
00179     if (m == ASSIST_INLET)
00180         sprintf(s,"Input to be Synchronized");
00181     else 
00182         sprintf(s,"Synchronized Output of Inlet %ld", a+1);
00183 }
00184 
00185 void buddy_inletinfo(t_buddy *x, void *b, long a, char *t)
00186 {
00187     /*
00188      *  red if every  input - 1 has been set and you're looking to the one which will trigger
00189      */
00190     long i, count;
00191     t_member *m, *m2;
00192     
00193     for (i = count = 0, m = x->b_mem; i < x->b_num; i++, m++) {
00194         if (i == a)
00195             m2 = m;
00196         if (m->m_on)
00197             count++;
00198     }
00199     
00200     if (count >= (x->b_num - 1) && ! m2->m_on)
00201         *t = 0;
00202     else
00203         *t = 1;
00204 }
00205 
00206 void buddy_free(t_buddy *x)
00207 {
00208     short i;
00209     
00210     for (i=1; i < x->b_num; i++)
00211         freeobject(x->b_mem[i].m_proxy);
00212     freebytes(x->b_mem,(unsigned short)(x->b_num * sizeof(t_member)));
00213 }
00214 
00215 void *buddy_new(long num)
00216 {
00217     t_buddy *x;
00218     short i;
00219     t_member *m;
00220 
00221     x = (t_buddy *)newobject(buddy_class);
00222     if (num < 2)
00223         num = 2;
00224     x->b_num = num;
00225     x->b_id = 0;
00226     x->b_mem = (t_member *)getbytes((unsigned short)(num * sizeof(t_member)));
00227     for (i=num-1,m = x->b_mem + i; i >= 0; i--,m--) {
00228         if (i)
00229             m->m_proxy = proxy_new(x,(long)i,&x->b_id);
00230         m->m_out = outlet_new(x,0L);
00231         m->m_on = 0;
00232         m->m_argc = 1;
00233         m->m_argv[0].a_type = A_LONG;
00234         m->m_argv[0].a_w.w_long = 0;
00235     }
00236     return x;
00237 }
